text: It ’ s time to bust out the yogurt guacamole and misshapen pirate donuts, because two of Netflix ’ s best new food - related shows — Queer Eye and Nailed It — are getting picked up for second seasons. The news comes six weeks after the premiere of the lifestyle makeover show and less than three weeks after the debut of the hilarious cooking competition. Vulture notes that Netflix wants to release new episodes of both series by the end of the year. A reboot of a trend - setting early aughts TV show, Queer Eye introduced audiences to five new lifestyle experts — aka the Fab Five — including culinary aficionado Antoni Porowski.
